short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: URL shortener plugin to allow "go/shortcut" in the URL bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin to allow writing "go/keyword" in URL bar. It will catch the request and pass it on to the goto web page, and it will forward you to the link stored with the given keyword. Sending you quickly to your end destination.
